comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Takla Haymanout:

text.language: Pip~neuma m~parakl/ton: e~tafi~ e~pec/t e~bol qen t~ve: e~jen v~iwt pimakarioc: pia~gioc Yekla Humanoc.
The Spirit of comfort, came down from heaven, upon the blessed father, Saint Takla Haymanout.

language.div: Roh Penghibur, turun dari surga, atas bapa yang diberkati, Santo Takla Haymanout.

text.language: الروح المعزى لما نزل من السماء على الطوباوى القديس تكلا هيمانوت.
Qen pie~hoou m~mah somt (g#): n~te pefjinmici etc~marwout: efws e~bol je ouai pe: Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#.
On the third day, of his blessed birth, he proclaimed "One is the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit."

language.div: Pada hari ketiga, dari kelahirannya yang diberkati, ia nyatakan, "Satu adalah Bapa, Putra, dan Roh Kudus."

text.language: فى اليوم الثالث لميلاده المبارك. صرخ قائلا واحد هو الآب والابن والروح القدس.
Ouoh icjen tefmeta~lou: afmoh e~bol qen Pip~neuma e#y#u#: ouoh nia~geloc n~te t~ve: nau erq/ibi e~h~r/i e~jwf.
And from his childhood, he was filled with the Holy Spirit, and the angels of heaven, overshadowed him.

language.div: Sejak masa kecilnya, ia dipenuhi Roh Kudus, dan para malaikat surga, menaunginya dengan sayap mereka.

text.language: ومنذ طفوليته امتلأ من الروح القدس وملائكة السماء كانت تظلل عليه.
Mi,a/l p~ar,wn n~na niv/oui: ef,/ nemaf n~c/ou niben: kata v~r~/] e~tafjoc: n~je Dauid qen pi'almoc.
Michael the head of the heavenly, was always with him, as was said by, David in the Psalms.

language.div: Mikhael kepala surgawi, selalu bersamanya, seperti yang dikatakan oleh, Daud dalam Mazmur.

text.language: ميخائيل رئيس السمائيين كائن معه كل حين. كما قال داود فى المزمور.
AP,#c# ouwnh nak e~bol: ouoh af] nak m~pie~rsisi: piconh nem pibwl e~bol: m~v~r/] n~nefa~poctoloc.
Christ was revealed to you, and He gave you the authority, to loosen and to bind, like the Apostles.

language.div: Kristus nyatakan diri padamu, berikan kuasa padamu, 'tuk ikat dan lepaskan, seperti para rasul dahulu.

text.language: والمسيح ظهر لك وأعطاك سلطان الربط والحل كمثل رسله.
Akswpi n~oua~poctoloc: f~cwtp n~I/#c# P,#c#: ar,/e~reuc n~niE~yafs: v~iwt n~te nimona,oc.
You became an apostle, chosen by Jesus Christ, the Patriarch of the Ethiopians, the father of the monks.

language.div: Engkau jadi seorang rasul, pilihan Yesus Kristus, Patriark bangsa Etiopia, bapa para biarawan.

text.language: وصرت رسولا مختارا ليسوع المسيح رئيس كهنة للأحباش وأبا للرهبان.
F~holj n~je pekran afswpi: qen nenrwn nem niremEyaus: je V] m~pia~gioc: Yekla Humanoc senh/t qaron.
Your name became sweet, on our lips and the Ethiopians, O God of Saint Takla, the Ethiopian have pity upon us.

language.div: Namamu manis di bibir kami dan di tengah bangsa Etiopia, ya Allah dari St. Takla, kasihanilah kami umat Etiopia.

text.language: صار اسمك حلو فى أفواهنا وأفواه الأحباش بقولنا يااله القديس تكلا هيمانوت تراءف علينا.
